original_title: AV男優に恋をして…処女だった私はAV女優になりました。
overview: One day, Makoto Toda was watching a porn movie and fell in love with the main actor.  She contacted him with a sex proposition, but he told her that he doesn’t give freebies, instead, proposed to her to become an actress…
title: I fell in love with an AV actor… I was a virgin and became a porn star actress. Toda Makoto
